page.title: 05SUPERSTITIONS/CUSTOMS
page.content: Don't cross knives. Don't look at a new moon through glass. Don't cross on the stairs. Don't take snowdrops,lilac or mayflower into a house. Cross your fingers when walking under a ladder. Don't eat pork or rabbit when there is an 'R' in the month. If you drop a fork,expect a female visitor. If you drop a knife,expect a male visitor. If you drop a spoon,expect a disappointment. If you spill salt,throw it over your left shoulder with your right hand. Cast no clout till May is out(Don't wear shorts,T-shirts etc. until the beginning of June).
